title: Flickering bottom half screen of screen
content:
Has any one noticed, I bring up the key board (not noticed any other time)
And every couple of seconds normally when moving my eye from top of screen to bottom, I can actually see the refresh of the bottom half of the screen, a kinda flickering, had the 2 and 3 neither of them did it
But kinda hard on the eyes as I can see the keyboard being drawn like it's got a very slow refresh rate ?
Very annoying
